PortMidi
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PortMidi installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PortMidi, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PortMidi/2.0.4-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
